object.name: axe lumber two-handed
object.description: A heavy lumber axe lies here.

extra_description.description: It is a heavy axe of the kind lumberjacks use to chop down trees.

object.name: shirt
object.description: A chequered shirt lies here.

extra_description.description: It is an extra large, chequered shirt made from heavy cloth.

object.name: boots
object.description: A pair of leather boots lies here.

extra_description.description:
They are fashioned from rough leather that has been oiled frequently to make
                     |it stay waterproof.  They look worn but quite functional.

object.name: fireplace
object.description: A fireplace made from stone is set against the east wall.

extra_description.description:
It is fashioned from stones of various sizes that have been stacked on top of
                     |each other and fastened with mortar.  Its chimney is constructed likewise and
                     |leads the smoke out through the low cabin ceiling.

object.name: chest
object.description: A wooden chest stands in the corner.

extra_description.description:
It is a robust chest made from short, heavy planks that have been fastened
                     |together with tenons.  It is equipped with a simple brass lock.

object.name: key
object.description: A small brass key lies here.

extra_description.description: It is a small, simple brass key with no inscriptions or marks of any kind.

object.name: coins silver
object.description: Some silver coins lie piled up in a heap on the floor.

extra_description.description: The coins seem to be gold.  They are obviously valuable.

object.name: blackberries
object.description: Some blackberries grow on a bush nearby.

object.name: mushroom
object.description: A small mushroom grows nearby.

extra_description.description: It is a tasty little thing.

object.name: water barrel
object.description: A water barrel has been left here.

object.name: tree opening
object.description: A colossal tree blocks the way westwards.

extra_description.description:
The opening is far too narrow for you to squeeze through but it looks as if the
                       |tree is hollow.

This enormous tree must be a thousand years old.  Its rough bark looks grey
                       |and pale and is decorated with scratches and claw marks.  On its west side is a
                       |small opening just above ground level.

object.name: branch
object.description: A long, grey branch rests heavily on the ground.

object.name: branch
object.description: A long, grey branch rests heavily on the ground.

object.name: branch
object.description: A long, grey branch rests heavily on the ground.

object.name: toadstool
object.description: A large toadstool grows nearby.

extra_description.description:
It is a large, brown boletus that must weigh nearly five pounds.  The top
                     |surface is covered in a thin layer of transparent slime that emits a weak,
                     |musty smell.  Not the most delicious thing you have seen.

object.name: toadstool
object.description: A large toadstool grows nearby.

extra_description.description:
It is a large, brown boletus that must weigh nearly five pounds.  It has small
                     |white spots and the top surface is covered in a thin layer of transparent slime
                     |that emits a weak, musty smell.  Not the most delicious thing you have seen.

object.name: potion yellow
object.description: A yellow potion has been left here.

extra_description.description: It has a deep yellow colour and and a strong spicy smell.

object.name: shield large
object.description: A large round shield has been left here.

extra_description.description: It is made from hard wood that has been reinforced with heavy iron bands.

object.name: crown iron
object.description: An iron crown rests on the ground.

extra_description.description: It is a heavy human-sized crown made from solid iron.

object.name: ring iron
object.description: An iron ring has been left here.

extra_description.description:
It is a quite heavy human-sized ring made from solid iron.  It lacks
                     |decorations of any kind.

object.name: morning-star star morning
object.description: The morning star is here collecting dust while it lies on the ground.
